sent.orig: She have a temporary job or temporary post with a firm of solicitor.
sent.trans: 她暂时在一家律师事务所工作。

sent.orig: No.10 Li Xiaoyun temporary top 04 Ying Huang a temporary bottom.
sent.trans: 10号李霄云暂居首位，04号黄英暂时垫底。

sent.orig: Despite the use of the word "temporary", a temporary withdrawal remained in effect until expressly revoked.
sent.trans: 尽管使用了“暂时”一词，但是这种暂时的命令在明确地撤销之前一直有效。

sent.orig: Temporary speed restriction Speed restriction on behalf of planned, temporary conditions, e.g. track maintenance.
sent.trans: 临时限速计划的，临时情况下的速度限制，如线路维护。

sent.orig: Temporary projects include temporary cofferdam project and protection project of ancient relics.
sent.trans: 临时附属工程主要是临时围堰工程和文物防护工程。
